title: Reported: Epstein corresponded and met with FSB Academy graduate Sergei Belyakov (2014–2017)
summary: The Dossier Center published emails and travel/activity records purporting to show Jeffrey Epstein sought meetings and advice via Sergei Belyakov—an FSB Academy graduate and then‑Russian economic official—about sanctions, introductions, and a model's alleged blackmail. The Dossier Center's reporting has not been independently verified by U.S. authorities or other news organizations.
actors: Central Bank Deputy Chairman Alexei Simanovsky

sources.title: Jeffrey Epstein's Russian Connection: Billionaire's ties with FSB Academy graduate revealed
Ex-deputy minister helped organize Epstein's meetings with Russian officials
sources.notes: Russian-language coverage of Dossier Center findings

sources.title: Dossier Center alleges ex-deputy minister helped Epstein with Russian contacts
Russian deputy minister allegedly facilitated Epstein meetings
The Cesspool and Chaos: the Russian Connection in the Epstein Affair

notes: Based on Dossier Center investigation. No primary documents (court filings, government records) have independently corroborated these specific alleged meetings beyond Dossier Center's source materials. Properly categorized as 'reported' pending independent verification.
